entry.source: {F812}Demiurge\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351506}My lightning will course through your{F801}bodies until there is nothing left of{F801}you but ash!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demiurge\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351506}My lightning will course through your{F801}bodies until there is nothing left of{F801}you but ash!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demiurge\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351507}As long as you are children of man,{F801}you will remain prisoner...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351508}Both in body and spirit...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351509}Give up, be silent, and...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351510}...be cursed.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demiurge\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351507}As long as you are children of man,{F801}you will remain prisoner...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351508}Both in body and spirit...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351509}Give up, be silent, and...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351510}...be cursed.{F801}
